title.value: Machine learning-assisted selection of adsorption-based carbon dioxide capture materials
title.justification: The title directly states the focus of the paper, which is using machine learning to optimize materials for CO2 capture via adsorption.
title.quote: Machine learning-assisted selection of adsorption-based carbon dioxide capture materials

extractions.description: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques to select optimal adsorbents for carbon dioxide capture based on previously collected data. It focuses on identifying adsorbent characteristics that lead to high capture capacity and selectivity, with an emphasis on explainable and interpretable machine learning models to provide clear rules and patterns for stakeholders.

type.justification: The paper applies machine learning methods to real-world data to determine optimal materials for carbon dioxide capture, which is indicative of empirical research.
type.quote: Hence, data was collected from different sources including research papers, literature reviews and publicly available datasets. Additionally, an ensemble of diversified (explainable and interpretable) machine learning techniques was utilized to classify these collected data with a classification accuracy above 98%.

name.justification: The primary focus is on carbon capture, which is a significant concern in Environmental Engineering.
name.quote: Recently, carbon capture has gained increased attention as a sustainable way for mitigating global warming.

name.justification: The research makes use of machine learning techniques to analyze and optimize data for carbon capture.
name.quote: an ensemble of diversified (explainable and interpretable) machine learning techniques was utilized

name.justification: The study involves material selection and optimization which are core components of Chemical Engineering.
name.quote: Machine learning-assisted selection of adsorption-based carbon dioxide capture materials

name.value: Ensemble of diversified machine learning techniques
name.justification: The paper mentions using an ensemble of machine learning methods to classify data.
name.quote: an ensemble of diversified (explainable and interpretable) machine learning techniques was utilized

is_contributed.justification: The ensemble of machine learning techniques is used in the analysis rather than being developed as part of the research.
is_contributed.quote: an ensemble of diversified (explainable and interpretable) machine learning techniques was utilized

is_executed.justification: The ensemble model is executed on the collected data to achieve classification and interpretability in the research.
is_executed.quote: an ensemble of diversified (explainable and interpretable) machine learning techniques was utilized to classify these collected data

is_compared.justification: The paper does not mention comparing different models; it focuses on the results from the ensemble model.
is_compared.quote: an ensemble of diversified (explainable and interpretable) machine learning techniques was utilized to classify these collected data

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no specific referenced paper title for the machine learning models used.
